languages.text: "Как отец многочисленного семейства смею заверить — вы не уронили имя династии, Ваша Светлость".
"As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "Как отец многочисленного семейства смею заверить — вы не уронили имя династии, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "As the father of a large family I can assure you that you have not shamed the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"As the father of a large family I can assure you that you have not shamed the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
"As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, en tant que père d'une famille plutôt nombreuse, je puis vous assurer que vous avez fait honneur à votre dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, en tant que père d'une famille plutôt nombreuse, je puis vous assurer que vous avez fait honneur à votre dynastie. »

languages.text: “身为大家族的族长，我可以向您保证，您并没有辜负王朝的声誉，大人。”
languages.original_text: "As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “身为大家族的族长，我可以向您保证，您并没有辜负王朝的声誉，大人。”

languages.text: "Als Vater einer recht großen Familie kann ich Euch versichern, dass Ihr dem Namen der Dynastie Ehre gemacht habt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Als Vater einer recht großen Familie kann ich Euch versichern, dass Ihr dem Namen der Dynastie Ehre gemacht habt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: «Como padre de una gran familia que soy, le aseguro que ha defendido el nombre de la dinastía, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Como padre de una gran familia que soy, le aseguro que ha defendido el nombre de la dinastía, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: 「大家族の父親として、陛下が王朝の名誉を守っていることを保証いたしましょう」
languages.original_text: "As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「大家族の父親として、陛下が王朝の名誉を守っていることを保証いたしましょう」

languages.text: "Oldukça büyük bir ailenin babası olarak sizi temin ederim ki hanedanlığın adını kara çıkarmadınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "As the father of a rather large family, I can assure you that you have upheld the name of the dynasty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Oldukça büyük bir ailenin babası olarak sizi temin ederim ki hanedanlığın adını kara çıkarmadınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
